text:
e="preserve">There are some materials which offer some resistance to the current flow; they are not good Electrical conductor<nowiki/>s or good Electrical insulator<nowiki/>s. They are resistive materials, for example graphite, iron, and certain synthetic materials.
where formula_1 is resistance in ohms, formula_1 is voltage in volts, and formula_1 the current in amperes.
The ohm was named after Georg Ohm.
